cktsbp06645781map1mdgomfb5.title: Inventory value calculator
cktsbp06645781map1mdgomfb5.body: Image and text recognition AI to calculate inventory value using ImageAI and OCR. Similar to what HarvestVendor does but next level ü§ì

requested a new game event from overwolf to support this, i will be waiting their response before diving into training models. 
https://discuss.overwolf.com/t/path-of-exile-extend-the-opened-page-event-to-include-page-content/2025

I really like the idea of counting currency as shown in the picture. This would help making sure people put the correct amount in the trade window. I'd also really like to see a complementary behaviour where it would sum up all currencies and give you an estimate based on poe.ninja prices. Could be in chaos or in exalt.
Maybe you could ask for an update from overwolf. Its already 9 months ago and still no new infos from them.

clbz80n9p010bk91yvzyu99m4.title: Evaluate Grand Heist items on the go
clbz80n9p010bk91yvzyu99m4.body:
Since we can only evaluate items that are in our inventory, we can't evaluate the final item of Grand Heists without actually picking it up. We have to go on poe.ninja to check every Gem/Replica Uniques which can get tiresome and is quite slow.

If we could quickly evaluate that are in Curio Display on the go, that'd be great!

cllp771r5001vob29k1nrgbgh.title: Vendor paster

Save a regex with a name

Press a shortcut that show the different regex saved

Apply "ctrl+f" automatically plus the regex

cldgcll3h0062r71saost1l2s.title: Inbuilt REGEX generator
cldgcll3h0062r71saost1l2s.body: Some regex generator for rolling maps. It could check for a range of quantity/rarity/packsize, but also highlight blocked mods.

ckx3rzbui794452skvfl9bv9uw.title: Multi Client Option
ckx3rzbui794452skvfl9bv9uw.body:
Hi, I am using two POE clients, one for trading and one for playing the game.

One is the Steam Client and one is the normal Client.

I would like to use the overlay for both clients, at the moment the overlay is stuck to the last open client. So if I close the game with did not have the overlay and reboot it gets then the overlay. 

I don't know if it's possible, but if you could make an option so that you maybe can switch between separate clients so that we don't have to close and open the games, that would be awesome. 

LG CTekk

comments.body:
Good Idee, have the Same Problem. At the moment, I use a sec software to check Items on my Main Account.
Would be really nice if I could use this for Both of my Games.

Could be a new tab in the Option UI next to the change log.

Hello!

ckzd6digy419082umd17bf59lv.body: abbility to see what stash tab is in when somebody send a trade (you can already see the item name in the bottom left i would like it to also show the stash tab name)

comments.body:
Hi there, we display the stash name in the upper part of the stash overlay. See the green box in the screenshot below.
Please let me know if this is enough, or if you still want the stash name to be displayed somewhere else. Thanks for your feedback!

I would love if the bar where the stash name is would be a bit bigger. It's pretty small and hard to read. I would suggest making it the same font size as everything else like the size of the search bar or the stash name.
That's valid feedback. Hmm, currently there are some technical restriction preventing me from scaling the whole stash highlight window. I will see how we can improve this. Thanks for your suggestion!

ckw56ayp32970472tnum7j4zg02.title: Thank you message in different languages
ckw56ayp32970472tnum7j4zg02.body: Send the "Thank you for trading" message in the appropriate language, as the initial trade message was in.

comments.body: This would only be relevant for outgoing trades, as incoming trades are always in your own language. I'm not sure this is worth implementing but if enough users vote, I will consider it :)

clml5z4lh00wan6292rxhsl1p.title: [TRADE] A sound notification when buyer enters H/O
clml5z4lh00wan6292rxhsl1p.body: In addition to the player's name turning green when a buyer enters your H/O, it could be nice to have a toggle for an audio notification as well.

cllxzwvgn00ebn6291kff4lew.title: Trade Toast Notification: Highlight inviting
cllxzwvgn00ebn6291kff4lew.body: Highlight with a yellow border people who invites you to party when you're doing multiple trades to point them for whispering later when you finished trade with previous one

cllwimuxd009tn629xmdqyvie.title: Default Market Filters (permanently enabled options)
cllwimuxd009tn629xmdqyvie.body:
Just like the "evaluate" options, it would be amazing if we could have togglable options for the market that's always going to be active even after you clear the query. 

For example, the "Collapse Listings by Account" is really useful to have active for most trades, but when you clear the query, you have to enable it again. This would be a great QoL option.


Here's a concept of what I'm talking about:

cli846ap401dvos280kzwp7vj.title: Highlight bank item after "x" amout of time listed
cli846ap401dvos280kzwp7vj.body:
A feature that would highlight items in your bank after they have been "X" amount of time on the market (listing age). It would help identify items that need their price to be lowered.

I don't know if this is some kind of information that is retrievable from the oauth connection.

clgo8w07f09wgoj20rrwsag9p.title: Trade statistics system
clgo8w07f09wgoj20rrwsag9p.body:
We do tons of trades with the help of POE overlay, but we don't know how many, or how much currency did we make, or how much currency we spend on the item.


I know there is other software that can track profit like Exilence Next. But we don't have a function to auto-record what or how much did we sell/ buy on one item. 

Instead of viewing profit from the overlay afk popup window, we can add an option to turn on/off the trade record and record all the trades into an Excel spreadsheet, either .csv or .txt.

Since the overlay knows the trade was selling or buying, when you finish the trade, typically, you will go for click the send finish button, and then the trade goes away anyway. So we can use that finish button action to confirm and save that trade record.

In that txt file can show information like time(in the log's timestamp), cost(the overlay already recognized), item name, etc.

clgj1nu3i09feoj20jv6j2bdp.title: divine price placeholder for messages
clgj1nu3i09feoj20jv6j2bdp.body:
l would like to be able to send other players a message containing the divine price listed on poe.ninja. Something like '{latestWhisper} Divine Orbs are currently worth {divinePrice} chaos'.

Or even better would be a button on the trade window that tells the other player the fractional prices displayed in the window, so we can agree on a price before we begin the trade.

cldwfaesc00p0ml1r3ojnaclj.title: Shareable favorited/saved searches
cldwfaesc00p0ml1r3ojnaclj.body: Would be an awesome feature to be able to somehow share your favorited/saved searches, I have spent a lot of time creating some for my builds which i would like to share with my friends that play same builds.

comments.body: If we could do this by importing / exporting trade links, that would be great! Then we could also share with friends who don‚Äôt use PoE Overlay yet!

cktsbp2fj47469map1iqn119gj.title: Player ignore built-in feature
cktsbp2fj47469map1iqn119gj.body: I would love to see my player ignore list be linked from the official website. Could also be a totaly independant one if it's simpler to implement. Being able to directly add players to that list from the evaluate or market feature would be awsome.

comments.body: This is somewhat supported if you link your GGG account. The market results should already be using the ignore list of your linked account. I'm planning extending on this integration by also making the ignore list editable in the market. So stay tuned o/

cktsbp2er47453map15eb3o7us.title: In-game window for live searches
cktsbp2er47453map15eb3o7us.body: Something similar to the trade feature window but for live searches. This would be helpfull to players having a single monitor setup.

cl8csqp052928991xj5sgt0nkme.title: Custom Messages
cl8csqp052928991xj5sgt0nkme.body: I would like to see an option where u could maybe add custom messages besides the default 4 that you have

comments.body: Hi there, thanks for creating this issue. Could you explain it a bit further and give an example on how this should work? Does it only affect trade message? (should you be able to use data from the trade message as placeholders) Or are those messages more globally and can be send anytime?

basically would be for like trading wise so something like you are doing sextants (selling them) but people keep wanting to only buy 1 at a time but you are only wanting to sell in bulk so having like the option where you could may addon another box in this area 
https://i.imgur.com/k0U5nr6.png
 where you could add in a message using the placeholders telling the person you are only wanting to sell in bulk something like that if you understand what im saying

I gotcha. I think for now you could use a command as a workaround by using the {latestWhisper} placeholder. See the screenshot below.
If this gets more traction in the future, we may implement this as part of the trade module.

cln80qjnz00rjsr29wbskp68b.title: Option to look up timeless jewel only by seed
cln80qjnz00rjsr29wbskp68b.body:
Please add an option when looking up timeless jewels to search for that specific seed number with any possible name (Kaom/Rakiata/etc).


Many timeless jewels have value based on the seed alone regardless of the changed keystone passive as you only care about the stats added to the notable passives and don't pick up the keystone.

Basically this search:
https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ancestor/2GgP3Gjfk

Instead of this default one:
https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ancestor/gmlkay6UQ

clmqwro3a018ln62918z8zo9s.title: [EVALUATE] Have the "Buyout Price" toggle at the evaluate window
clmqwro3a018ln62918z8zo9s.body:
Having the "Buyout Price" toggle directly at the evaluate window would help change the currency type more easily.

Right now, the evaluate window for "listed items" does a conversion based on poe.ninja price, which results is erronous amounts, especially for compasses. 

For exemple, default could be chaos orb equivalent as it is right now, but definitly needs a warning that a conversion is happening. Maby something like a gray dot similar to the market. Changing the currency would cancel this conversion and show exact currency.

clmkyc7om00vgn629qxsmckuq.title: Automatically select fractured mods in item evaluation
clmkyc7om00vgn629qxsmckuq.body: If an item has a fractured mod, this mod should be automatically selected when evaluating the item. Alternatively, this could be implemented as a preference.

It would be nice if the evaluate window could parse veiled mods with their respective master. For exemple, this item has a Vagan's veiled mod, but the parser does not parse it completly.

Item Class: One Hand Axes

Rarity: Rare

cld8wpaf504e9k91yjrq7eosv.title: Bulk selection of products that match the filter settings.
cld8wpaf504e9k91yjrq7eosv.body:
On the example of maps: the game uses filtering based on regular expressions. This is good, but too short (about 50 characters per search)

1) It would be great if the program could look at all the cards at once and show which ones fit the conditions.

2) If this is not possible, then you can add the "Online Tracking" mode so as not to constantly click on each ALT + Q card, but simply move the mouse and it will immediately show the card suits the conditions or not.

The first option sounds "tastier", but it is not known whether it is possible to implement it.

comments.body:
So if i understand you correctly, this feature would check the mods for all maps at once and potentially highlight maps that have bad mods?
Would this be something you use once or multiple times? e.g. if you want to use it to roll maps, you would need to be able to trigger it multiple times (after rerolling a map) in a short period of time. This would rule out using the stash api as the items are not that often refreshed.

You understood correctly, it should highlight bad cards.
For example, in my case, I go through 20 maps of one location per day.
This function will be convenient for people who are engaged in farming.
If using the chest to display bad cards is not possible, you can try the second suggested option.

clbwklgie00spk91ya5ov0c1x.title: Ability to save and share settings
clbwklgie00spk91ya5ov0c1x.body:
It would be great to be able to save and share settings for Evaluate (or anything else). 

I am a fan of the new (2 leagues ago) default search settings but I still have several things that I change every time those settings all get reset. I have some friends who also use PoE Overlay and I would like to easily share those settings.

comments.body:
That's a great idea! I think my only concern is, how we can prevent importing settings from older/newer version(s), may cause some issues if the data structure now longer fits.
Would this still work for you if you could only import settings from a specific version?

yes, though my hope is to not have settings entirely reset when the data structure changes. Some aspects don't change (from user perspective) for things like evaluate settings, keybinds and the like. Much easier said than done. 
But sharing would make it so only one person in a group would need to update all the settings again. Maybe If it is a popular feature, then you could have a way to import from a list of people

cl8kgkuka12171311xnxzoy0w13z.title: Trade: Automatically close trade window upon leaving
cl8kgkuka12171311xnxzoy0w13z.body:
It would  be nice to have a setting for automatically closing a poe trade window whenever that person leaves the party.

You can say "Thanks" then remove them from party which will remove the window but lots of times for me; people join and then leave without trading (notably in currency trade).
you can manually remove them right now but it can get tedious.
Hopefully this would be a keybind to toggle this function on and off. Just a setting would work too.

comments.body: There is this circling arrow button that clears the whole list if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre looking for.

this is more for consistent trading. I wouldn't want to close other trades still active. just the ones that are completed or the guy left group before completing.
Could have another limiter of only removing them if they are both not in my hideout and left the group (some people leave the group early).
 I realize I am an edge case, trading as much as I do, but I think it would be good QoL for regular trading too.

Hey there, thanks for posting this suggestion. For now the app is unable to get any information about the current party. It's not part of the game logs. So the only way of retrieving this information would be through Overwolf events. I've request a new event for this in the past but it hasn't been processed yet. See following topic: 
https://discuss.overwolf.com/t/path-of-exile-party-members/2046

clmjtd9na00r1n629pdew57t7.title: Currency Tracker
clmjtd9na00r1n629pdew57t7.body:
Would it be possible to add a currency tracker that auto-snapshots your stash every 10 minutes or so? The current tracker is nice, but I'm hoping it can add some of the features I enjoyed from Exilence Next now that the app is dead.

It would also be cool if this info could be displayed on the in-game overlay.

comments.body:
Hey there, 
the current tracker creates a new snapshot of the selected profile every ~20 minutes. We won't be able to support taking an automated snapshot as frequent as 10 minutes because depending on how many stashes we need to retrieve, we would reach the rate limits and cause a temporary block from the API. 
Let us know what other features you are missing and what things you'd like to see in-game, cheers!

cleu8knyw02ogoj20u6d9hqd1.title: Some stat search ideas
cleu8knyw02ogoj20u6d9hqd1.body:
Preface: I am not a professional programmer so I can not speak to the ease with which these can be accomplished. These are functions I would like to have available, but I do understand that they may be difficult or maybe even impossible to do. Regardless, I wanted to share them for your consideration just in case.

Generalized stat searches - Say I want all rings that impact chaos in any ways, regardless of resistance, damage, penetration.. I don't know exactly what mods are available and so I was to browse an overview of items with that particular keywords.

Item Type and Item Name grouping - 

Perhaps I am interested in the items that provide the most Increased Item Quantity. This often returns many results of the same item making it difficult to get an idea of what alternatives may be available. If instead, all items named "Goldrim" were nested in a collapsible manner then I could see the next best option for the price, ect. Different types of filters for collapsing would be nice too.

Item Base exclusion

Or in general any sort of exclusion options would be good here. We can exclude stats using the NOT stat filters at the moment but say I wanted to search all amulets for IIR but didn't want to see and Gold Amulet results. This would address that use case.

cleu89p6e02oeoj20yw9lefzf.title: Drag and drop stat filters
cleu89p6e02oeoj20yw9lefzf.body:
I would like to be able to drag a stat from market results into the stat filters. I think this would be especially useful when trying to search for terms that have multiple implementations with the same name (This can require adding many of the same filter line trying to find the one that's valid for your particular item type. Pseudo does not work in all cases.)

Another example from the above image would being able to drag and drop the implicit. While pseudo should cover this particular implicit, that is not always the case.

cldymx9e7000lkx1s3uzcadlt.title: Searching Bar Problem
cldymx9e7000lkx1s3uzcadlt.body: After a while i play (around every 10-15 min) i must reopen the overlay in order to use searching bars.When i press P button for example in search bar it opens skill tree instead of searching an item starting with P.The problem goes when i restart the overlay as i said but it is quite uncomfortable that i need to do this every 10 min or so.

clcfi6ao901nxk91ydct1zvde.title: Ideas for if/when we can know party members
clcfi6ao901nxk91ydct1zvde.body:
Automatically closing the notification window when someone leaves party. I think this would be really appreciated. Still suited as an option and not always active.

Better detection if they are in the same hideout as you. Even if they were sitting in hideout before you got there.

The one you brought up, putting a border around which person you want to trade with.

Could have a border like that but maybe a different color if in the same hideout.

cl2udd62a855152yo947oig1nn.title: Reset to default key-binds button
cl2udd62a855152yo947oig1nn.body: A way to reset keybinds to their original value would be great. Could be a global reset button or one per module.

comments.body: Hi, for now this would require reinstalling the app. We will see how we can improve on this behaviour. Thanks for your suggestion!

cl5nz8tc42184752yowlo4x28j2.title: Gamepad
cl5nz8tc42184752yowlo4x28j2.body: Please, add an option for gamepad UI. The inventory and stash layout are reversed.

cl2z5z9la2500192yo9hmibk3l7.title: Maps Layout For leveling
cl2z5z9la2500192yo9hmibk3l7.body: Hey, I dnt know if its possible or not buy I'd like an overlay of all maps or at least throughout the acts with quests that give skill points and waypoints pointed
